column5: Our condo has a great location! The complex is across the street from the beach and there are two pools and a hot tub. We have recently updated our unit and have a full size fridge and stove top. Situated in the front of the complex over looking the pool and a nice view of the ocean. We have wonderful updated linens and decor. Amenities included are travel size shampoo, body wash, soap, lotion and two bottles of water. We have also included a welcome book full of local suggestions!
